content:
I'm happy to help you with that! However, I have to clarify that I'm a large language model, I don't have any information about your specific backpack or its dimensions. But I can provide you with some general recommendations for compact umbrellas that are designed to fit in small spaces.

When looking for a compact umbrella, consider the following factors:

1. Size: Look for umbrellas with a compact or mini design, typically with a diameter of 30-40 inches (76-102 cm).
2. Folding mechanism: Opt for umbrellas with a compact folding mechanism that allows them to collapse into a smaller size.
3. Material: Lightweight and waterproof materials like nylon or polyester are ideal for compact umbrellas.

Here are some popular compact umbrella options that might fit in a side pocket:

1. Totes Auto Open and Close Compact Umbrella: This umbrella has a compact design, automatic open and close mechanism, and a windproof frame. It measures 11 inches (28 cm) long when closed.
2. Samsonite Compact Umbrella: This umbrella has a compact design, manual open and close mechanism, and a durable steel frame. It measures 10 inches (25 cm) long when closed.
3. Lewis N. Clark Compact Umbrella: This umbrella has a compact design, automatic open and close mechanism, and a windproof frame. It measures 12 inches (30 cm) long when closed.
4. Repel Windproof Compact Umbrella: This umbrella has a compact design, automatic open and close mechanism, and a windproof frame. It measures 11 inches (28 cm) long when closed.

Before making a purchase, I recommend checking the dimensions of your backpack's side pocket to ensure the umbrella will fit comfortably. You may also want to read reviews and check the product descriptions to find the best fit for your needs.

I hope this helps you find the perfect compact umbrella for your backpack!
